column4: when i try to launch games in ubuntu, they crash the entire system 90% of the time.  my video drivers are updated as far as i can tell, but feel free to tell me im wrong.  does anybody have any ideas what to do?
what do you mean by whole system? just X or what?
i think its just X, but theres no way for me to do anything but reboot
id check the logs i guess.. is your system up to date?
